item.description:
Publish or Perish. It's not just for college professors anymore.
Truth be told, in this age of Social Media and Internet speed, you may only be as good as your next published piece and the frequency with which you publish.

Is it Tweets? Blogs? Pixels or Print? or some combination of them?

5pm _ Join us for a reception sponsored by Kendall Press and Lindenmeyr Munroe. Think art reception folks. I am accustomed to snacks and drinks - We won't be charging a buck for a bottle of water and you can leave your biscuits home.

6:30 pm_ presentation on the argument between paper vs. pixels. I am widely published across multiple platforms and will share some real life experiences in my world of internet marketing and visual imagery. The presentation will be held in the conference room for Riverfront Office Park -co located next to Kendall Press, One Main Street, Cambridge.

7pm_ Join us in a lively discussion as we present some best practice examples and a takeaway that you can implement immediately.

This meetup is designed for individuals and businesses that want to engage their existing clients and potential customers and grow their business opportunities.
item.how_to_find_us: Kendall Press is located in Cambridge; lower level of the red brick building just before the Longfellow bridge and across the red line from Microsoft's NERD center. For directions check http://bit.ly/bRlNCV
item.why: Come join Keith Spiro Photography for a talk about how the confluence of technology and the internet has created new and exciting business opportunities and how you can apply the real time web to any of your own business ventures.
item.name: Publish or Perish - - - Pixels vs. Paper
